events.name: Multiple companies from several countries participate in the LIBs supply chain and.

events.wd_description: Multiple companies from several countries participate in the LIBs supply chain, including Indonesia.
events.description: Multiple companies from several countries participate in the LIBs supply chain, including Indonesia.

events.name: Indonesia's production is equivalent to 50% of global MHP/MSP production capacity and 6.8% class 1 nickel.
events.wd_label: Indonesia's production is equivalent to 50% of global MHP/MSP production capacity and 6.8% class 1 nickel.
events.wd_description: Indonesia will likely be the world's biggest producer of nickel ore in 2022 and become the largest producer of refined nickel.
events.description: Indonesia will likely be the world's biggest producer of nickel ore in 2022 and become the largest producer of refined nickel.

events.name: The number of operating nickel smelters was 2 before the first export ban in 2014, 13 in 2020, and should more than double to 30 through 2023.
events.wd_label: The number of operating nickel smelters was 2 before the first export ban in 2014, 13 in 2020, and should more than double to 30 through 2023.
events.wd_description: However, the ministry's plans have been revised before, and could prove to be too ambitious.
events.description: However, the ministry's plans have been revised before, and could prove to be too ambitious.

events.name: Indonesia's role in nickel supply
events.wd_description: Indonesia has a significant influence on the global nickel industry, with involvement in the LIBs supply chain through nickel mining and refining.
events.description: Indonesia has a significant influence on the global nickel industry, with involvement in the LIBs supply chain through nickel mining and refining.

events.name: kel ore export
events.wd_description: Indonesia exports raw nickel ore and matte nickel products as part of the LIBs supply chain.
events.description: Indonesia exports raw nickel ore and matte nickel products as part of the LIBs supply chain.

events.name: te nickel products
events.wd_description: Post-2017, Indonesia's involvement in the LIBs supply chain is through the export of matte nickel products and raw nickel ore refined by HPAL smelters.
events.description: Post-2017, Indonesia's involvement in the LIBs supply chain is through the export of matte nickel products and raw nickel ore refined by HPAL smelters.

events.name: L smelters
events.wd_description: High-Pressure Acid Leaching (HPAL) smelters process laterite ore into semi-finished materials needed for making LIBs.
events.description: High-Pressure Acid Leaching (HPAL) smelters process laterite ore into semi-finished materials needed for making LIBs.

events.name: tery component supply
events.wd_description: Indonesian nickel products are used in the LIBs supply chain, connected to at least 5 of the 10 largest LIB companies.
events.description: Indonesian nickel products are used in the LIBs supply chain, connected to at least 5 of the 10 largest LIB companies.

events.name: High Pressure Acid Leaching smelters
events.description: HPAL smelters process laterite ore into semi-finished materials needed for LIBs, producing grade 1 nickel laterite.

events.name: Export ban impact
events.description: Indonesia's raw nickel ore export ban led to the construction of nickel smelters to produce ferro-nickel products and later grade 1 refined nickel and matte nickel.

events.name: Strategic position in LIB supply chain
events.description: Indonesia's strategic position in the global LIB supply chain is due to its large nickel laterite reserves and connection with major LIB companies.
